metadata.dc:author: Ruggieri, J P
metadata.dc:description: From 1991 we have carried out 19 duodenopancreatectomy and we have reconstructed with pancreatogastrostomy in 11 opportunities. The mortality was of 0% and the morbidity reached 52.94%. In this presentation we propose technical sample.
metadata.dc:title: Pancreatogastroanastomosis.
[Pancreaticogastrostomy].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de la Facultad de Ciencias Medicas (Cordoba, Argentina)
